name: Condition Red
description: A space marine stranded on an overrun space station. Stay alive by outsmarting the enemy in Condition Red. Shoot, platform and solve puzzles in this action packed sci fi sidescrolling shooter.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SP1 Processor: Core i Class Pentium Dual Core or better Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Desktop GTX660 2GB or better DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 6925 MB available space Sound Card: Windows compatible
